label: 陣和卿
本: Jewel in the Ashes: Buddha Relics and Power in Early Medieval Japan . Harvard University Asia Center . 2000
説明文: This Chinese casting-master was recruited by Chōgen (1121-1206) to help with projects such as the reconstruction of the head of the Daibutsu at Tōdaiji, and reputedly went later to Kamakura at the invitation of the 3rd shōgun, Minamoto no Sanetomo (1192-1219).
